tag_line: UI apps that displays essential car info with a minimal style.
title: Tabbyz's Tachometer
message:
This mod contains three UI apps. Two of them display most essential car info, and the third app displays forced induction (boost).

The first two apps display speed, rpm, gear, fuel, and drivemode. They also displays icons for the following car functions: parking brake, headlights, turning signals, anti-lock braking system, electronic stability control and traction control. The second app also displays engine water temperature. You can click on the drivemode text to change drivemode.

[B]How to set up:[/B]
[LIST=1]
[*]Click subscribe, and wait for the mod to download.
[*]Make sure you are in freeroam, and have the menu open.
[*]Click on the UI apps tab, which should be to the left of the options tab.
[*]Click the green add app button.
[*]Scroll down and find the app that you want to use, and click on it.
[/LIST]
You should now see the UI app in the bottom right corner of your screen. You will probably have to remove or move the default apps in order to prevent them from overlapping. You can also resize, move and remove any UI app here. When you're done, press escape twice to exit the menu.

[B]Tachometer app:[/B]
[ATTACH]929674[/ATTACH] [ATTACH]929675[/ATTACH] [ATTACH]929676[/ATTACH] [ATTACH]929677[/ATTACH]

[B]Tachometer app with temperature:[/B]
[ATTACH]938328[/ATTACH]

[B]Forced induction app:
[ATTACH]975524[/ATTACH] [ATTACH]975525[/ATTACH] [ATTACH]975526[/ATTACH] [/B]

If you find a bug or have any feedback, feel free to make a post about it in the discussion thread of this mod.

I also want to thank [USER=254331]@angelo234[/USER] for helping me with the drivemode data.
